home.title_2: Supports hospitals in managing medical records, the hospitalized process of patients, etc.
home.title_4: Patient Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage everything related to Patient activities.
home.title_6: Doctor Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage everything related to Doctor activities.
home.title_8: Hospital Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage everything related to Hospital activities.
home.title_10: Medicine Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage everything related to Medicine activities.
home.title_12: Department Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage everything related to Department activities.
home.title_14: Categories Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage categories: medicine, treatment, etc...
home.title_16: Billing of all Patient consultancy and services with details of Patient Information, Consultation, Prescriptions, Treatment, etc.
home.title_18: Medical Care of all Patient consultancy and services with details of Patient Information, Consultation, Prescriptions, Treatment, etc.
home.title_20: Appointment Management module Hospital Management System is designed to manage the effective appointments of patients for the doctors
home.title_22: Accounts Management module of eHospital - Hospital Management System manages. Manages all hospitals, patients, doctors, billings, etc.
